Description:
Who are we looking for?
We are looking for a reliable Marketing Associate to join the Strategy team to support the business and marketing team by executing marketing campaigns & in strategizing campaigns that will drive more conversions for the business verticals. Mainly handles campaign planning execution, content creation, plus reporting and analysis.Strategy team within talabat is a small, multicultural team of ex-consultants and industry veterans. As a Marketing Associate, you will support day-to-day marketing operations, reporting & analysis, coordinating with relevant stakeholders across marketing, sales & customer support teams to ensure smooth functioning of the business programs. Working with stakeholders from different parts of the business, you can expect exposure to different aspects of talabat.Whatâ€™s on your plate?Manage daily marketing operations to support the overall marketing function

Work closely with relevant departments across the organization to ensure smooth operations and delivery of ongoing marketing initiatives

Handling, planning & liaising with internal teams to activate campaigns

Maintain and update relevant documentation and trackers including reporting of marketing expenses

Tracking all campaign communication & creating post-campaign result documents with corrective or next steps for new campaigns

Working with the manager to plan campaigns, which are aligned with the annual regional and local marketing calendars;

Conduct market research including competitive analysis on a regular basis, flag new trends and come up with marketing campaign ideas;

Coordinate with customer support teams to close tickets by tracking complaints and sharing required information 

Supporting content creation for different requirements including campaign planning, briefs, translations, etc.

Managing CMS tools for a variety of tasks like updating content, customer compensations, etc.  

Extending support on a need basis for adhoc operational requirements.
 What did we order?You have at least 2 years of relevant working experience, preferably in e-commerce

Strong project management skill set

You have strong stakeholder management & communication skills

You are comfortable working in a dynamic, fast-changing environment

Basic knowledge of business processes and marketing know-how

Attention to detail and results-driven personalityFluency in English. Arabic is an added advantageJob Details
